name: timePlatformer
description:
Jump around as a cube in quick and fast levels, get to the end of the level while avoiding spikes and big but fast crushing pillars!

DISCLAIMER
The controls in this small demo has either Xbox controller or a keyboard in mind,
I haven't tested with other types of controllers so proceed with caution.

Also note that this game doesn't have any music or sound as it wasn't a priority
during development.

Xbox Controls
Left Analog stick --> Movement
A-button --> Jump
Left Trigger --> Run
Right Trigger --> Activate Slow-motion

Keyboard Controls
A or Left Arrow Key --> Move Left
D or Right Arrow Key --> Move Right
Space Bar --> Jump
ALT --> Activate Slow-motion
